mapper.select: select emp_no empNo , email , dep_no deptNo , ename , (select descript from common_code where common_code = location) location , ext_num extNum , phone , address , post_code postCode , gender , birth , join_date joinDate from emp where emp_no = #{empNo}

SELECT e.emp_no empNo , e.email email , e.emp_pw empPw , e.ename ename , e.location location , e.dep_no depNo , d.dname dname FROM emp e INNER JOIN dept d ON e.dep_no = d.dep_no WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT emp_no empNo , dep_no depNo , email , ename , location , join_date , total_leave , used_leave FROM emp WHERE leave_date IS NULL
SELECT emp_no empNo, join_date joinDate FROM emp WHERE emp_no = (SELECT MAX(emp_no) FROM emp)
